However, Kang Sheng was not purged: Mao kept his loyal acolyte in reserve, albeit outside the newly established PRC Intelligence Services. Li Kenong was the better man for, among other things, negotiating an agreement with Moscow on cooperation between the Chinese and Soviet intelligence services.

中共的敌人在被迫离开中国大陆后并没有松懈，美国在朝鲜战争（1950-53 年）期间和之后遏制中国的努力导致中共将“非法”特工（没有外交掩护）派往海外中国的外围国家，甚至可能更远的国家。13 现在流亡台湾的国民党敌人及其美国支持者的调查给了毛和他的安全机构许多理由来采取积极的反间谍措施。在某种程度上，他们重建了延安在整个社会的高度警惕环境，追求动员和镇压运动，以加强政治控制并消除被认为是的敌人。在他日益增长的偏执狂中，毛对他的战时间谍大师之一潘汉年的错误反应过度，导致 1955 年对潘汉年进行清洗，并惩罚了 800 到 1000 名其他情报专业人员。同月，毛批准成立中华人民共和国第一个外国间谍机构，即由李克农领导的中央调查部（CID）。14

The CCP’s enemies did not relent after being forced from the Chinese mainland, and U.S. efforts to contain China during and after the Korean War (1950–53) led the CCP to send “illegal” agents (sans diplomatic cover) overseas to the nations of China’s periphery and probably beyond.13 Probes by the Nationalist enemy, now exiled on Taiwan, and their American backers gave Mao and his security apparatus numerous reasons to pursue vigorous counterintelligence measures. To an extent, they rebuilt the hypervigilant environment of Yan’an throughout society, pursuing mobilization and suppression campaigns to enhance political control and eliminate perceived enemies. In his mounting paranoia, Mao overreacted to a mistake by one of his wartime master spies, Pan Hannian, leading to the 1955 purge of Pan and punishment of between eight hundred and one thousand other intelligence professionals. In those same months Mao approved the creation of the PRC’s first foreign spy agency, the Central Investigation Department (CID), headed by Li Kenong.14

在 1950 年代的剩余时间里，CID 和其他机构，特别是解放军军事情报、公安部 （MPS） 和中共检查局，建立了机构间协调和共同标准，以进一步实现国家情报目标。15 随着中共对占多数的汉族社会的官僚控制增加，美国和台湾在华北、华东和华南的成功特工部署在 1950 年代有所下降，但在西藏，随着当地抵抗的增加，美国人加大了努力。16 中苏情报部门之间的关系破裂，安全部门内部的苏联顾问在 1960 年中苏分裂前一年离开。17

For the rest of the 1950s, the CID and other agencies, notably PLA military intelligence, the Ministry of Public Security (MPS), and the CCP Inspection Bureau, established interagency coordination and common standards to further national intelligence goals.15 Successful U.S. and Taiwan agent insertions in northern, eastern, and southern China declined in the 1950s as the CCP’s bureaucratic control over the majority Han society increased, but in Tibet the Americans stepped up efforts as local resistance mounted.16 Relations between Chinese and Soviet intelligence frayed, and Soviet advisors inside the security services departed a year in advance of the 1960 Sino-Soviet split.17

1957 年，国际刑事调查局局长李克农因健康状况恶化而缺席，并于 1962 年去世，留下包括孔原在内的有能力的副手负责，保密是国际刑事调查局的标志。18 正常运作一直持续到 1966 年文化大革命开始。那年开始的混乱使外国情报和国内反间谍行动陷入混乱。李克农的老上司康生回来，对情报和安全进行政治控制，公安部部长谢福之全力支持毛的计划，并臭名昭著地谴责包括邓小平在内的前赞助人。现有的外国情报领导层几乎完全被卷入了劳动改革或更糟的调查中。1967 年 4 月，红卫兵派系在国际刑事调查局内部战斗，导致毛和周将其置于解放军控制之下，至少部分是为了防止向红卫兵报纸披露机密材料。也许过去几十年中唯一的资深幸存者是罗庆昌，他在 CID 脱离军事控制后被任命为 CID 负责人。19

The sidelining of CID director Li Kenong in 1957 by declining health before his death in 1962 left able deputies including Kong Yuan in charge, and secrecy was the CID’s hallmark.18 Normal operations continued until the Cultural Revolution began in 1966. The chaos that began that year threw both foreign intelligence and domestic counterintelligence operations into disarray. Li Kenong’s old and still militant boss, Kang Sheng, returned to take political control of intelligence and security, and MPS minister Xie Fuzhi fully supported Mao’s program and notoriously denounced former patrons including Deng Xiaoping. The existing foreign intelligence leadership was almost entirely swept aside into labor reform or worse. In April 1967 Red Guard factions fighting inside the CID led Mao and Zhou to place it under PLA control, at least in part to prevent disclosure of classified materials to Red Guard newspapers. Perhaps the only senior survivor from previous decades was Luo Qingchang, who was appointed head of the CID after it was released from military control.19

尽管他支持毛的激进纲领，但在主席1976年去世并随后逮捕他的妻子江青和其他激进的四人帮领导人后，罗继续留任。在 1979 年开始的邓小平崛起期间，罗的幸存与谢夫之和康生的命运形成鲜明对比，他们被追判死后并被开除出中共。

In spite of his support for Mao’s radical program, Luo stayed in office after the chairman’s 1976 death and subsequent arrest of his wife, Jiang Qing, and other radical Gang of Four leaders. During the rise of Deng Xiaoping beginning in 1979, Luo’s survival stood in sharp contrast with the fates of Xie Fuzhi and Kang Sheng, who were posthumously condemned and expelled from the CCP.

文化大革命的结束扭转了激进左翼政策的突出地位，并导致那些以前被谴责的人得到了大规模的平反。数千名被告发入狱的中共情报干部就在其中。然而，他们的案件处理得很慢，也许是为了保护他们所采用的情报方法，但肯定是由于纠正毛泽东错误的政治敏感性。陈云是中共情报界的资深人士，现在是中共的经济沙皇，他领导了这些干部的名字一个接一个地洗清罪名的努力，仔细调查花了几个月或几年的时间。其中最突出的是潘汉年（1906-77 年）和 1978 年获释并于 1983 年 12 月获释的杨帆（1912-99 年）。20

The end of the Cultural Revolution reversed the prominence of radical left policies and led to a massive rehabilitation of those previously condemned. Thousands of CCP intelligence cadres who had been denounced and imprisoned were among them. However, their cases were handled slowly, perhaps to protect the intelligence methods they practiced but certainly owing to the political sensitivity of correcting the mistakes of Mao Zedong. Chen Yun, a CCP intelligence veteran and now the party’s economic czar, led efforts to clear the names of these cadres one by one, with careful investigations that took months or years. Prominent among them were Pan Hannian (1906–77), posthumously rehabilitated in August 1982, and Yang Fan (1912–99), released in 1978 and cleared in December 1983.20

在一次重大重组中，成立于 1983 年的 MMS 取代了 CID。直到那时，邓小平才迫使罗庆昌退休，其他文革受益者可能已经与他一起退出。21 他们抵制邓小平 1979 年 7 月的建议，即国际刑事调查局停止使用外交职位作为海外官员的掩护位置，这激怒了他。22 如果离职人数众多，那将是继 1955 年和 1966 年之后第三次出现经验丰富的军官外流，无论他们的政治立场如何，减少了中共外国情报专业人员的队伍。

In a major reorganization, the MMS founded in 1983 replaced the CID. Only then did Deng Xiaoping force Luo Qingchang to retire, and other Cultural Revolution beneficiaries may have exited with him.21 They had irritated Deng Xiaoping by resisting his July 1979 suggestion that the CID cease using diplomatic posts as cover positions for officers overseas.22 If the departures were significant in number, it would have been the third time after 1955 and 1966 that an exodus of experienced officers, whatever their politics, reduced the ranks of Chinese Communist foreign intelligence professionals.

1983 年后时代的特点是 MSS 在海外行动受到限制，而解放军情报部门在人类情报和非常成功的网络收集方面开展的海外行动越来越激进。1989 年 6 月 4 日的天安门事件为中美关系注入了看似永久的相互猜疑。中国对其主要贸易伙伴（尤其是美国、日本、英国和台湾）进行间谍活动的担忧稳步增加，这些国家对中国间谍活动的担忧也在稳步增加。23

The post-1983 era has been characterized by a constraint on MSS operations overseas and increasingly aggressive foreign operations by PLA intelligence, both in human intelligence and in its highly successful cyber collection. The June 4, 1989, Tian’anmen incident injected a seemingly permanent level of mutual suspicion into Sino-American relations. Chinese concerns about spying by its major trading partners, especially the United States, Japan, Britain, and Taiwan have steadily increased, as did these nations’ concerns about Chinese espionage.23

当今中国的监控

Surveillance in China Today

大多数中国公民，尤其是占多数的汉族成员，除非挑战权威，否则不会引起安全和监控机构的集中注意力。但其他一些更容易被视为对现状的威胁。藏人和维吾尔人等非汉族少数民族，如果被怀疑犯有“分裂国家”（支持从中国独立）的罪名，就会立即受到审查。其他人，如民主和人权活动家、为他们辩护的律师以及未经批准的宗教活动者也会受到官方监控。

Most PRC citizens, especially members of the Han majority, do not draw the focused attention of the security and surveillance apparatus unless they challenge authority. But others are more readily perceived as threats to the status quo. Non-Han minorities such as Tibetans and Uighurs, if suspected of “separatism” (favoring independence from China), attract instant scrutiny. Others, such as democracy and human rights activists, the attorneys who defend them, and unsanctioned religious practitioners also attract official surveillance.

外国人进入中国自然会吸引高于平均水平的官方和非官方关注，但这并不是铁板一块或绝对的。那些从事安全部门感兴趣的工作的人——外交官、记者、非政府组织的代表以及为感兴趣的外国企业工作的人——受到最严格的审查。最后一类包括在“敏感单位”（sensitive units，min gan de danwei）工作的外国人，例如得到本国政府坚定支持的大公司，以及将所需技术引入中国的公司。24 相比之下，其他商人、访客和学生则较低。他们占了中国大约 600,000 名常住外国人和每月访问的数万名游客中的绝大多数。

Foreigners entering China automatically attract higher than average official and unofficial attention, but this is not monolithic or absolute. Those with jobs of interest to the security services—diplomats, journalists, representatives of nongovernmental organizations, and those working for foreign businesses of interest—receive the most scrutiny. The last category includes foreigners working in “sensitive units” (敏感的单位, min gan de danwei), such as large corporations that have the firm support of their home governments and those bringing desired technology into China.24 By contrast, other business people, visitors, and students have a lower profile. They make up the vast majority of the roughly 600,000 resident foreigners in China and the tens of thousands of tourists who visit each month.

对于所有人来说，无论是中国人还是外国人，都有一个完成例行监控的项目基线，以满足中国政府的行政要求。市或县公安局 （PSB） 的地方警察通过记录每个居民的住宅和工作地点的国民身份证 （ID） 系统监视其管辖范围内的所有中国公民。虽然不是每个人都努力遵守，尤其是那些为了新工作而行动的人，但由于技术的进步和中共改进和保护自身的决心，这个系统可能比以往任何时候都更有效。警方维护着一个大型数据库，将每个公民的身份证号码与其姓名和出生日期、种族、性别和地址联系起来，并链接到其他感兴趣的数据，例如该人的居留证（户口、户口）和包含工作相关信息的档案（档案）文件。这可以称为“监控基线”，因为它适用于每个中国公民，跟踪生活的日常细节，使当局能够发现意外情况并决定是否进行调查。

For all people, Chinese and foreign, there is a baseline of programs that accomplish a routine surveillance serving the administrative requirements of the Chinese state. Local police, working from municipal or county Public Security Bureaus (PSBs; see the Ministry of Public Security [MPS]), keep in view all PRC citizens within their jurisdiction via the national identification (ID) card (身份证, shenfen zheng) system that records each resident’s home and place of work. Though not everyone strives to comply, especially those who move for a new job, this system is probably more effective than ever because of advancing technology and the CCP’s determination to improve, and preserve, itself. Police maintain a large database that links each citizen’s ID card number with his or her name and date of birth, ethnicity, sex, and address, with links to other data of interest such as the person’s residence permit (户口, hukou) and the dang’an (档案) file containing work-related information. This can be termed a “baseline of surveillance” because it is applied to every PRC citizen, tracking the routine details of life, allowing authorities to detect the unexpected and decide whether to investigate it.

与中国公民相比，外国人的固定目标较少，但仍然以相同的基本目标进行跟踪。那些半永久居住在中国的人，通常是持有工作或结婚签证的人，必须在其居住地的当地公安局登记，如果被雇用，还必须在他们工作的警区报告他们的存在。一些外国人设法避免了这种情况，但有被驱逐的风险。出差的外国访客、交换生和游客不能豁免，即使他们访问了朋友的家。在酒店，每个外国人都向前台提交他或她的护照，前台工作人员会复印重要页面并将其发送给当地公安局。如果外国人是报到大学上课的学生，学校也必须遵守。

Foreigners are a less permanent fixture than PRC citizens but are nonetheless tracked with the same baseline goals in mind. Those living semipermanently in China, typically on employment or marriage visas, must register with the local PSB in their place of residence and, if employed, must also report their presence in the police district where they work. Some foreigners manage to avoid this but risk expulsion. Foreign visitors on business, exchange students, and tourists are not exempted, even if they visit the home of a friend. At hotels, every foreigner submits his or her passport to the front desk, where staff copies the important pages and sends them to the local public security bureau. If the foreigner is a student reporting for classes at a university, the school must similarly comply.

正如中国人必须始终携带其国民身份证一样，法律要求外国人携带护照。这些步骤使 PSB 能够更轻松地核算其管辖范围内的每位居民和每位访问外国人。虽然这对外国人来说似乎很极端，但请设身处地为当地 PSB 指挥官着想：如果一个人，无论是外国人还是中国人，在你的地区失踪或犯罪，CCP 将追究你的责任：你最好能够向上级提供有关需求的完整信息。中国当局将这一系统更多地视为问责而非监控。北京对基线监控的心态有助于解释为什么中共将隐私、言论自由和宗教等普世人权视为旨在颠覆其统治的鸭子。

Just as Chinese must always carry their national ID cards, foreigners are required by law to carry their passports. These steps enable PSBs to more easily account for every resident and every visiting foreigner in their jurisdiction. While this may seem extreme to foreigners, place yourself in the shoes of a local PSB commander: if a person, be s/he foreigner or Chinese, in your district goes missing or commits a crime, the CCP will hold you accountable: you had better be able to provide full information on demand for higher-ups. PRC authorities view this system more as accountability than surveillance. Beijing’s mindset about baseline surveillance helps explain why the CCP views universal human rights like privacy and freedom of expression and religion as canards intended to subvert its rule.

最近加入这些基线计划的是“社会信用”系统（社会信用体系，shehui xinyong tixi），计划在 2020 年全面推出。该系统在很大程度上得到了非常成功的在线销售平台阿里巴巴的支持。它运营着支付宝，用户只需一部手机就可以购买各种各样的产品，甚至是农贸市场的蔬菜。支付宝还为用户提供芝麻 （芝麻） 或芝麻信用的入口。该公司正在组装一个“社会诚信系统”，该系统已经整合到 Zhima Credit 中，这是一个包含 600 万拖欠法院罚款的人的政府数据库。据蚂蚁金融服务（阿里巴巴集团旗下在线金融部门）首席执行官彭玉玲称，芝麻信贷将“确保社会上的坏人无处可去，而好人可以自由无阻地行动”。25 阿里巴巴可能会与中共密切合作，以实现其社会控制的目标。公司不仅有 2094 名党员;它还在 2012 年将其内部中共机构升级为集团党委（集团党委），同时聘请了第一位首席险官（首席险官）。 他就是邵晓锋，一位在 MPS 工作了 20 年的获奖老兵。26 邵先生在公司高层中的高位令中国以外的大多数企业安全高管羡慕不已，他们偶尔会升到这个级别，但通常会被降级到阶梯上低得多的级别。

Lately joining these baseline programs is the “social credit” system (社会信用体系, shehui xinyong tixi), scheduled to fully roll out by 2020. The system is enabled in significant measure by Alibaba (阿里巴巴), the highly successful online sales platform. It runs Alipay, which allows users to buy a wide range of products, even vegetables in a farmer’s market, with just a mobile phone. Alipay also offers users entry into Zhima (芝麻), or Sesame, Credit. The company is assembling a “social integrity system” that has already integrated into Zhima Credit a government database of six million people who have defaulted on court fines. According to Lucy Peng, chief executive officer of Ant Financial Services (the online finance arm of Alibaba Group), Zhima Credit will “ensure that the bad people in society don’t have a place to go, while good people can move freely and without obstruction.”25 Alibaba will probably work closely with the CCP to meet its goals of societal control. The company not only has 2,094 party members among its employees; it also upgraded its internal CCP organ to a Group Party Committee (集团党委, Jituan dang wei) at the same time in 2012 as it hired its first chief risk officer (首席险官, shouxi xianguan). He is Shao Xiaofeng (邵晓锋), an award-winning twenty-year veteran of the MPS.26 Shao’s high post within his firm’s hierarchy is the envy of most corporate security executives outside of China, who occasionally rise to that level but are normally relegated to a much lower rung on the ladder.

除了基线监控之外，还有大多数国家用来监控犯罪活动的工具。贩毒是一个日益严重的问题，以及其他犯罪行为，如涉嫌间谍活动，都受到了严密的监视。尽管很难确定这些工作的确切数字，但 MPS 和 MSS 似乎雇佣了数千人来开展六项基本工作：

Beyond baseline surveillance lie the tools used by most nations to monitor criminal activity. Drug trafficking, an increasingly serious problem, and other offenses such as suspected espionage attract intense surveillance. Though putting an exact number to these efforts is difficult, the MPS and the MSS appear to employ thousands of people to run six basic efforts:

• 步行和车辆监控

•  foot and vehicle surveillance

• 通过广阔的城市闭路电视摄像机网络进行观测

•  observation via the expansive urban closed-circuit television camera networks

• 固定电话和移动电话录音和位置跟踪

•  landline and mobile telephone recording and position tracking

• 电子邮件和所有其他在线活动的电子监控

•  electronic monitoring of email and all other online activity

• 对与主题有接触的人的采访

•  interviews with people in contact with the subject

• 来自使用信用卡和自动柜员机的数据。27

•  data from the use of credit cards and automatic teller machines.27

这些方法与其他国家/地区（包括泰国）使用的方法没有什么不同;区别在于中共对监控的重视程度、其技术成熟度、观看的人数以及缺乏对隐私的程序保障。28 无需法官签发的搜查令即可对个人或组织展开严密监视。

These methods are not unlike those used in other countries, including Thailand; the difference lies in the priority given to surveillance by the CCP, its technological sophistication, the numbers of people doing the watching, and the lack of procedural guarantees of privacy.28 No warrant issued by a judge is needed to initiate intense surveillance on a person or organization.

什么样的活动会引起安全关注和调查？与其他任何地方一样，如果有人被怀疑犯罪或成为安全或情报目标，就会使用这些功能。对中国来说，一个关键的区别是，与其他国家相比，中国接待的外国人比例非常低，而且由于历史原因，官员们对他们作为一个群体持怀疑态度。一位在中国有长期经验的前西方情报官员这样说：“因为外国人在中国人口中很少，所以在中国的外国人无论去哪里旅行，特别是当他离开常规的外籍人士和旅游路线时，都会像船一样创造一个'尾流'。中国人对生活中不寻常的事情有着美好的回忆，看到一个以前从未去过的外国人是普通中国人会记住的事情，即使他不热衷于立即报告。29

What kind of activity prompts focused security attention and an investigation? Like anywhere else, these capabilities are employed if someone is suspected of committing a crime or becomes the object of security or intelligence interest. A crucial difference for China is that the country hosts very few foreigners by percentage of population compared to other lands, and officials are suspicious of them as a group for historical reasons. One former Western intelligence officer with long experience in China put it this way: “Because there are few foreigners in relation to the Chinese population, a foreigner in China creates a ‘wake,’ like a ship, wherever he travels, particularly when off the regular expat and tourist tracks. Chinese have excellent memories for the unusual in their lives, and seeing a foreigner where none has been before is an event that the average Chinese will remember, even if he is not enthusiastic about reporting it immediately.”29

上一次在中国出现如此历史性的外国人高峰是在动荡的 1920 年代和 1930 年代，当时中国对外国占领和不断扩大的日本征服感到恼火。虽然当时和现在有很多不同，但现代中国安全官员，如果心态保守，他们知道这一点，并且很容易从越来越多的外国人中看到危险。为了正确看待这个问题，我们可以回顾一下，现代中国不是一个建立在移民基础上的国家，相反，它是一个种族平衡相对静止的国家，甚至直到 20 世纪，它偶尔也会孤立自己。

The last time there was such a historic peak of foreigners in China was the troubled 1920s and 1930s, when China chafed under foreign occupation and expanding Japanese conquest. While there are many differences between then and now, modern-day Chinese security officials, if of a conservative mindset, know this and could easily see danger in the mounting number of foreigners. To keep this problem in perspective, we can recall that modern China is not a country build on immigrants—instead, it is a country with a relatively static ethnic balance that has occasionally isolated itself, even up to the twentieth century.

外国客人被认为可疑而会引起监视的活动包括但不限于：与已知的持不同政见者或其他已成为监视目标的人接触;访问大学校园或少数民族地区的外交官或记者;宗教劝人改教;离封闭区域或军事区太近;以及拥有前外国政府隶属关系，特别是情报或军事联系。因此，例如，如果您居住在中国并参加教堂，并且该事实未在国家宗教事务局 （国家宗教事务局） 登记，这可能会引起您的兴趣。 如果教会的青年团体决定在当地酒吧区散发传单，地方当局会注意到并可能采取意想不到的行动。

Activities by foreign guests considered suspicious that attract surveillance include, but are not limited to, contact with known dissidents or other persons already targeted for surveillance; diplomats or journalists who visit university campuses or minority areas; religious proselytizing; straying too close to closed areas or military zones; and possessing a former foreign government affiliation, particularly an intelligence or military tie. So, for example, if you live in China and attend a church, and that fact is not registered with the State Administration for Religious Affairs (国家 宗教事务局, Guojia zongjiao shiwu ju), that could be of interest. If the church’s youth group decides to leaflet the local bar area, local authorities will notice and possibly take unanticipated action.

这项反间谍行动于 2014 年初秘密开始，直到 2016 年才公开，加强了安全部门对外国人的关注，尤其是来自澳大利亚、新西兰、英国、加拿大、日本、台湾和美国的人。30 与俄罗斯和缅甸等地的反间谍和警察不同，追踪外国人的中国特工往往是微妙和专业的，而不是明目张胆的——除了一些例外，例如代表当局进行恐吓的当地签约暴徒。简而言之，除非训练有素的监控团队希望您知道他们正在监视，或者您有经验和相关培训，否则您可能无法检测到他们。

The antispy campaign that began secretly in early 2014 and was only publicized in 2016 intensified security service attention to foreigners, especially people from Australia, New Zealand, Britain, Canada, Japan, Taiwan, and the United States.30 Unlike counterspies and police in, for example, Russia and Burma, Chinese agents tracking foreigners tend to be subtle and professional, not blatant—with some exceptions, such as locally contracted thugs who carry out intimidation on behalf of authorities. In short, unless a well-trained surveillance team wants you to know they’re watching or you have experience and relevant training, you probably won’t detect them.

尽管外交官和记者等一些群体可能会获得优先权，但安全部门不可能一直监视每个外国人。最后，在中国开展行动的中国安全部队可能大致相当于公海上的美国海军：他们不可能同时无处不在，但他们会去他们想去的地方，一旦就位，他们就会去那里并主导该地区。

Though some groups such as diplomats and journalists may receive priority, the security services cannot watch every foreigner all the time. In the end, Chinese security forces operating in the PRC might be roughly compared to the U.S. Navy on the high seas: they can’t be everywhere at once, but they go where they want and dominate the area once in place.

◆ 关于中国间谍和安全术语的基于 Web 的词汇表 y ◆ 的说明

◆ Note on Web-Based Glossar y ◆ of Chinese Espionage and Security Ter ms

中国情报部门和公安部用于交易技能、任务、行动类型、人员类别等的词汇揭示了与西方做法的相似之处和对比。马克思列宁主义 - 斯大林主义 - 毛思想的世界观是一个区别因素（例如，chanchu hanjian，叛徒除草;Shenmi Zhuyi，神秘主义;三慈达左清，三大左转）。另一个是现代之前中国行动的悠久历史（jiandie，间谍;Mein Ji，“美丽的人计划”或“蜂蜜陷阱”）。中国共产党的阴谋和秘密渊源以及苏联在成立初期提供的帮助也很突出：迪下，地下;丹仙，单线控制;neixian，“内线”或渗透剂;以及三秦，或秘密特务的“三勤”。

The vocabulary used by the PRC intelligence services and the Ministry of Public Security for tradecraft skills, tasks, types of operations, categories of people, and so on reveals parallels and contrasts with Western practices. A Marxist-Leninist-Stalinist-Mao-thought worldview is one distinguishing factor (for example, chanchu hanjian, traitor weeding; shenmi zhuyi, mysticism; sanci da de zuoqing, three big left deviations). Another is the long history of Chinese operations before modern times (jiandie, spy; meiren ji, “beautiful person plan,” or honey trap). The conspiratorial and secret origins of the Chinese Communist Party and the help provided by the Soviet Union in its early years also stand out: dixia, underground; danxian, single line control; neixian, “inner line” or penetration agent; and the san qin, or “three diligences” for a secret agent.

由于它的大小和需要定期更新的可能性，我们已将此词汇表放在 ccpintelterms.com 在线。我们欢迎就如何改进在线词汇表和我们其他工作提出意见和建议，尤其是在有证据支持的情况下。

Because of its size and the probability that regular updates are required, we have placed this glossary online at ccpintelterms.com. We welcome comments and suggestions—especially when backed by evidence—on ways to improve the online glossary and the rest of our work.

◆ 注意事项 ◆

◆ Notes ◆

前言

Preface

    1. 请参阅迈克尔·达顿 （Michael Dutton）、迈克尔·舍恩哈尔斯 （Michael Schoenhals）、斯科特·坦纳 （Scot Tanner）、弗雷德里克·韦克曼 （Frederic Wakeman）、迈尔斯·余茂春 （Miles Machun Yu） 和威廉·汉纳斯 （William Hannas）、詹姆斯·马尔维农 （James Mulvenon） 和安娜·普格利西 （Anna Puglisi） 的作品参考书目，以扩展本文。他们的作品是关于中国秘密行动的较高质量的作品之一。大卫·钱伯斯 （David Chambers） 即将出版的著作也将因其对中国革命中共情报的深入处理而引起人们的兴趣。

    1.  See the bibliography for the works of Michael Dutton, Michael Schoenhals, Scot Tanner, Frederic Wakeman, Miles Maochun Yu, and William Hannas, James Mulvenon, and Anna Puglisi to expand on this text. Theirs are among the better-quality works about Chinese clandestine operations. The forthcoming work by David Chambers will also be of interest for its in-depth treatment of CCP intelligence in the Chinese Revolution.

    2. “大象与盲人”，https://www.jainworld.com/literature/story25.htm.

    2.  “The Elephant and the Blind Men,” https://www.jainworld.com/literature/story25.htm.

介绍

Introduction

    1. 中国对情报的定义与其他国家的定义相似，但有自己的精确性。例如，中华人民共和国词典将情报（情报、清报）定义为“收集有关对方军事、政治、经济、外交、科学和各个方面的机密信息的调查和其他方法”。台湾军事教科书将情报定义为“使用秘密、公开和半公开方法收集有关对手的信息的具体报告，包括军事准备和发展、意图和未来战区布局”。李增群编：《实用公安小词典》（哈尔滨：黑龙江人民中央社，1987），第345页，第363页;胡文林编，《薛庆宝》（台北：中阳军师远晓，1989），1-2,5-6。

    1.  Chinese definitions of intelligence resemble those of other countries but have their own precision. For example, a PRC dictionary defines intelligence (情报, qingbao) as “investigative and other methods to collect confidential information on military, political, economic, diplomatic, scientific, and various aspects of the other side.” A Taiwan military textbook defines intelligence as “specific reports that use secret, open, and semi-open methods to compile information on an adversary, including military preparation and development, intent, and future battle area layout.” Li Zengqun, ed., Shiyong Gong’an Xiao cidian [A Practical Public Security Mini-Dictionary] (Harbin: Heilongjiang Renmin Chubanshe, 1987), 345, 363; Hu Wenlin, ed., Qingbao Xue [The Study of Intelligence] (Taipei: Zhongyang Junshi Yuanxiao, 1989), 1–2, 5–6.

    2. 有关清宝 [情报]、安全 [安全]、公安 [公安]、保卫 [保护] 和其他相关概念的进一步定义，请参阅中国间谍和安全术语的 Web 词汇表。正如我们将在后面的章节中看到的那样，tewu [特种作战] 一词是一个包罗万象的，包括 qingbao [情报] 和 baowei [保护]，以及 zhencha [“侦查”或侦察，似乎是战术情报和反间谍现场工作的结合]，而 gong'an [公安] 包括京察 [警务] 和 chanchu hanjian[挖出或“清除”汉族的叛徒——非法帮助外国人的人]。郝在金，《中国秘密战争——中共情报与保护工作实录》（北京：左家出版社，2005年），第3页。美国对安全的定义是“建立和维持保护措施，旨在确保不受敌对行为或影响的不可侵犯状态”，似乎包括中国的保卫 [保护重要人物] 和公安 [公共安全] 的思想。Leo D. Carl，《美国和外国情报、反间谍和贸易技术中情局内幕词典》（华盛顿特区：NIBC 出版社，1996 年），第 566 页。

    2.  See the web-based glossary of Chinese espionage and security terms for further definitions of qingbao [intelligence], anquan [security], gong’an [public security], baowei [protection], and other related ideas. As we will see in subsequent chapters, the term tewu [special operations] is a catch-all that includes qingbao [intelligence] and baowei [protection], with its subset of assassination work, and zhencha [“detection” or scouting, which seems to be a combination of tactical intelligence and counterintelligence field work], while gong’an [public security] included both jingcha [policing] and chanchu hanjian [digging out or “weeding” traitors to the Han Chinese—people who illegitimately assist foreigners]. Hao Zaijin, Zhongguo mimi zhan—zhonggong qingbao, baowei gongzuo jishi [China’s Secret War—The Record of Chinese Communist Intelligence and Protection Work] (Beijing: Zuojia Chubanshe, 2005), 3. An American definition of security, the “establishment and maintenance of protective measures which are intended to ensure a state of inviolability from hostile acts or influences,” seems to include Chinese ideas of baowei [protection of important persons] and gong’an [public security]. Leo D. Carl, CIA Insider’s Dictionary of U.S. and Foreign Intelligence, Counterintelligence, and Tradecraft (Washington, DC: NIBC Press, 1996), 566.

    3. 陈永发，《中国共产党七十年》（台北：联书社，1998），第221页;冯小梅编，1921-1933：《中公中阳在上海》（上海：中公党师出版社，2006），第368页。

    3.  Chen Yung-fa, Zhongguo Gongchandang Qishi Nian [Seventy Years of the Chinese Communist Party] (Taipei: Linking Books, 1998), 221; Feng Xiaomei, ed., 1921–1933: Zhonggong Zhongyang zai Shanghai (Shanghai: Zhonggong Dangshi Chubanshe, 2006), 368.

    4. 郝，中国米米展，1,6-8;木心，《隐秘前线大师》周恩来 [周恩来，隐秘前线大师]（北京：中国青年出版社，2002），8-9,14-15,133-34;陈，中国工钱堂七世年，109-10;U. T. Hsu， The Invisible Conflict （香港： China Viewpoints， 1958）， 10;薛宇，〈中共中央特别支部若干问题的调查〉，《中共共产主义历史研究》，1999年第3期，第2-3页。

    4.  Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 1, 6–8; Mu Xin, Yinbi zhanxian tongshuai Zhou Enlai [Zhou Enlai, Guru of the Hidden Battlefront] (Beijing: Zhongguo Qingnian Chubanshe, 2002), 8–9, 14–15, 133–34; Chen, Zhongguo Gongchandang Qishi Nian, 109–10; U. T. Hsu, The Invisible Conflict (Hong Kong: China Viewpoints, 1958), 10; Xue Yu, “Guanyu zhonggong zhongyang teke nuogan wenti de tantao” [An Investigation into Certain Issues Regarding the CCP Central Committee Special Branch], Zhonggong Dangshi Yanjiu [The Study of Chinese Communist History], no. 3 (1999), 2–3.

    5. 因为他是叛徒，一些中国账户避免承认谷开来负责国家安全局，但那里和台湾的权威消息来源清楚地表明，谷开来对整个机构负有“长期”的“实际责任”，直到他被捕。许，《看不见的冲突》，56-57;Hao， Zhongguo mimi zhan， 5， 8;张俊梅编，《中国共产党名人录》，第2卷（台北：国际关系研究所，1970年），第435页;刘武生编，周恩来《周恩来辞典》（南昌：江西人民出版社，1998年），第31页。

    5.  Because he was a traitor, some PRC accounts avoid admitting Gu was in charge of the SSS, but authoritative sources there and from Taiwan make clear that Gu had “actual responsibility” for the whole organ “in the long term” until his capture. Hsu, The Invisible Conflict, 56–57; Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 5, 8; Chang Jun-mei, ed., Chinese Communist Who’s Who, vol. 2 (Taipei: Institute of International Relations, 1970), 435; Liu Wusheng, ed., Zhou Enlai Da Cidian [The Dictionary of Zhou Enlai] (Nanchang: Jiangxi Renmin Chubanshe, 1998), 31.

    6. 赵永天，《虎穴里》，（北京：君师学书社，1994），3.

    6.  Zhao Yongtian, Huxue Shuxun [In the Lair of the Tiger] (Beijing: Junshi Kexue Chubanshe, 1994), 3.

    7. Frederick C. Teiwes，《中国的政治与清洗：政党规范的整顿和衰落，1950-65年》（Armonk， NY： M. E. Sharpe， 1979），第159页。

    7.  Frederick C. Teiwes, Politics and Purges in China: Rectification and the Decline of Party Norms, 1950–65 (Armonk, NY: M. E. Sharpe, 1979), 159.

    8. 为中共组织和宣传部门在敌区从事危险的“地下”工作的干部也面临着类似的危险。最后一类中最突出的是中华人民共和国前主席刘少奇，他在文化大革命期间在狱中受苦并去世。

    8.  A similar hazard was faced by cadres who had conducted dangerous “underground” work in enemy areas for the CCP organization and propaganda departments. The most prominent in this last category was former PRC president Liu Shaoqi, who suffered and died in prison during the Cultural Revolution.

    9. 这个理想在文化大革命（1966-76）中达到顶峰，但植根于 1949 年革命之前。有关简要说明，参见 Frederick C. Teiwes 和 Warren Sun，《毛泽东时代的终结：文化大革命黄昏期间的中国政治》（Armonk， NY： M. E. Sharpe， 2007），329,390n17;亚历山大·潘佐夫和史蒂文·莱文，《毛：真实的故事》（纽约：西蒙和舒斯特，2012年），第555-56页;Andrew G. Walder，《毛统治下的中国：脱轨的革命》（剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，2015年），第336-37页。

    9.  An ideal that was at its height in the Cultural Revolution (1966–76) but has roots in the pre-1949 revolution. For brief explanations, see Frederick C. Teiwes and Warren Sun, The End of the Maoist Era: Chinese Politics During the Twilight of the Cultural Revolution (Armonk, NY: M. E. Sharpe, 2007), 329, 390n17; Alexander V. Pantsov and Steven I. Levin, Mao: The Real Story (New York: Simon and Schuster, 2012), 555–56; Andrew G. Walder, China Under Mao: A Revolution Derailed (Cambridge: Harvard University Press, 2015), 336–37.

  10. 中央情报局，“北京国际战略研究所成立”，1979 年 12 月 14 日，中央情报局电子阅览室，https://www.cia.gov/library/readingroom/docs/DOC_0001257059.pdf。

第 1 章.中共情报机构

Chapter 1. Chinese Communist Intelligence Organizations

    1. 例如，张少宏和徐文龙，《红色国际代理人》（Haerbin：Haerbin Chubanshe，2005）;于天明，《红色鉴帝——代号八山》（北京：左家出版社，1993年）。

    1.  For example, Zhang Shaohong and Xu Wenlong, Hongse guoji tegong [Red International Agents] (Haerbin: Haerbin Chubanshe, 2005); Yu Tianming, Hongse jiandie—daihao Bashan [Red Spy—Code Name Bashan] (Beijing: Zuojia Chubanshe, 1993).

    2. 马克·凯尔顿，“普京大胆尝试否认斯克里帕尔攻击”，密码简报，2018 年 9 月 19 日，https://www.thecipherbrief.com/putins-bold-attempt-to-deny-skripal-attack。

    2.  Mark Kelton, “Putin’s Bold Attempt to Deny Skripal Attack,” The Cipher Brief, September 19, 2018, https://www.thecipherbrief.com/putins-bold-attempt-to-deny-skripal-attack.

    3. 于洪色剑铁—daihao Bashan;沈学明编，《中共第一代至第十五次中央委员》（北京：中医文显出版社，2001），第621页;穆欣，《陈庚同志在上海》（北京：文士词典出版社，1980），第6-8页。

    3.  Yu, Hongse jiandie—daihao Bashan; Shen Xueming, ed., Zhonggong diyi jie zhi diwu jie Zhongyang weiyuan [Central Committee Members from the First CCP Congress to the Fifteenth] (Beijing: Zhongyang Wenxian Chubanshe, 2001), 621; Mu Xin, Chen Geng tongzhi zai Shanghai [Comrade Chen Geng in Shanghai] (Beijing: Wenshi Zike Chubanshe, 1980), 6–8.

    4. 穆，银碧湛仙童帅 周恩来，6-9。

    4.  Mu, Yinbi zhanxian tongshuai Zhou Enlai, 6–9.

    5.  Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 2.

    6. 郝，2 岁;穆，银碧湛贤通帅 周恩来，7.

    7. 薛，《官渝中公中阳特克》，第2页。

    7.  Xue, “Guanyu zhonggong zhongyang teke,” 2.

    8. 不同的中国消息来源对中共情报的早期提供了不同的描述，但最令人信服和最严谨分析的描述是薛教授的“官羽中公中阳特哥”。

    8.  Different PRC sources provide varying accounts of the earliest days of CCP intelligence, but the most convincing and rigorously analytical account is by Xue, “Guanyu Zhonggong Zhongyang Teke.”

    9. 薛，2-4;周恩来年谱 1898-1949 [周恩来编年史，1898-1949]（北京：中阳文显出版社，1989），128。

    9.  Xue, 2–4; Zhou Enlai nianpu 1898–1949 [Annals of Zhou Enlai, 1898–1949] (Beijing: Zhongyang Wenxian Chubanshe, 1989), 128.

  10. 薛，“官语中宫中阳技”，3-4。

  10.  Xue, “Guanyu zhonggong zhongyang teke,” 3–4.

  11. 大多数资料承认，顾至少是SSS事实上的负责人：“实际的负责人”（shiji fuze 任） in Hao， Zhongguo mimi zhan， 5;《中国共产党革命组织人员名录》（北京：中工党中央社，2000年），第117页。另见张，《中国共产党名人录》，第 2 卷，第 435 页;Frederic Wakeman Jr.，《上海警务，1927-1937 年》（伯克利：加州大学出版社，1995 年），第 138-39 页。

  11.  Most sources admit that Gu was at least the de facto head of the SSS: “the actual head” (shiji fuze ren) in Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 5; the “leader” (bu zhang) in Zhongguo gongchandang lingdao jigou yange he chengyuan minglu [Directory of Organizations and Personnel of the Communist Party of China During the Revolution] (Beijing: Zhonggong Dangshi Chubanshe, 2000), 117. See also Chang, Chinese Communist Who’s Who, v. 2, 435; Frederic Wakeman Jr., Policing Shanghai, 1927–1937 (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1995), 138–39.

  12. Hao， Zhongguo mimi zhan， 9;俞茂春，《中国的开源软件：冷战序曲》（纽黑文，康涅狄格州：耶鲁大学出版社，1996年），第34-35页;芭芭拉·巴努安和于昌根，周恩来，《政治生活》（香港：香港中文大学，2006年），第45-46页;穆，陈庚同志在上海，34-40。

  12.  Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 9; Maochun Yu, OSS in China: Prelude to Cold War (New Haven, CT: Yale University Press, 1996), 34–35; Barbara Barnouin and Yu Changgen, Zhou Enlai, A Political Life (Hong Kong: Chinese University of Hong Kong, 2006), 45–46; Mu, Chen Geng tongzhi zai Shanghai, 34–40.

  13.  Mu, Yinbi zhanxian tongshuai Zhou Enlai, 12.

  14. 1932 年至 1934 年，李克农在瑞金同时担任第一方面军 PPB 执行部和执行部部长。“李克农”，《中国共产党新闻》，http://cpc.people.com.cn/GB/34136/2543750.html，http://www.xwwb.com/web/wb2008/wb2008news.php?db=15&;thisid=95528。

  16.  January 1931 (Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 15) or May that year (Xu Zehao, Wang Jiaxiang nianpu [Annals of Wang Jiaxiang] (Beijing: Zhongyang Wenxian Chubanshe, 2001), 56–57).

  17. 谭振林、李一芒、李玉堂、吴烈、海景林和马竹林也担任了新局的领导职务。Hao， Zhongguo mimi zhan， 13 岁;沈中阳伟源， 322.

  17.  Tan Zhenlin, Li Yimang, Li Yutang, Wu Lie, Hai Jinglin, and Ma Zhulin were also noted in leadership positions for the new bureau. Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 13; Shen, Zhongyang weiyuan, 322.

  18. Hao， Zhongguo mimi zhan， 10;沈，中阳伟源，99 岁;何锦洲，邓《邓法传》（北京：中工党书出版社，2008），第70-71页。

  19. 如前所述，在瑞金期间，李先生同时担任第一方面军警察局执行部和警察局的负责人。

  19.  As already noted, while in Ruijin, Li was simultaneously the head of the Enforcement Department of the PPB and of the PPB in the First Front Army.

  21. 郭;〈张顺清〉，百度在线百科，http://baike.baidu.com/view/2710205.htm。张也走上了军队政治军官的职业轨道。他于 1942 年在广东获得党委职务，但于 1944 年在那里被国民党俘虏并杀害。

  21.  Kuo; “Zhang Shunqing,” Baidu Encyclopedia online, http://baike.baidu.com/view/2710205.htm. Zhang was also on the army political officer career track. He attained a party committee position in Guangdong in 1942 but was captured and killed there by the KMT in 1944.

  22.  Kuo, Analytical History, 7.

  23.  Mu, Yinbi zhanxian tongshuai Zhou Enlai, 463–64, 466; interview with Taiwan academic, 2016. Available organization directories are not specific about Qian’s duties.

  24. 杨世兰，《邓发》，载于《中共党史人物传》，第一卷（习安：习安人民书社，1980），第359页。

  26. 郝，《中国米米展》，19-20。

  26.  Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 19–20.

  27. 埃德加·斯诺，《红星飞越中国》（伦敦：维克多·戈兰茨有限公司，1938年），第431页;埃德加·斯诺，《红色中国随便记（1936-1945）》（剑桥，马萨诸塞州：哈佛大学出版社，1957年），第42、43、46页。

  27.  Edgar Snow, Red Star Over China (London: Victor Gollancz Ltd., 1938), 431; Edgar Snow, Random Notes on Red China (1936–1945) (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1957), 42, 43, 46.

  28. 郝，中国米米詹，54。

  28.  Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 54.

  29. 到 1938 年 8 月，康生掌管了所有党的情报。钟侃，《康生传》（北京：红旗出版社，1982年），第77页。第三个被吸收到SAD的前身是毛在延安的保护部队保卫处（保卫处）。

  29.  Kang Sheng ran all party intelligence by August 1938. Zhong Kan, Kang Sheng Pingzhuan [A Critical Biography of Kang Sheng] (Beijing: Hongqi Chubanshe, 1982), 77. The third predecessor absorbed into the SAD was the Guard Division (保卫处, Baowei chu), Mao’s protection unit in Yan’an.

  30. 唐纳德·克莱因和安妮·克拉克，《中国共产主义传记词典，1921-1965年》，第1卷（剑桥，马萨诸塞州：哈佛大学出版社，1971年），第425页;2016 年对党历史学家的采访。

  30.  Donald W. Klein and Anne B. Clark, Biographic Dictionary of Chinese Communism, 1921–1965, vol. 1 (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1971), 425; interview with party historian, 2016.

  31. 郭的著作是 1968-71 年至 1980 年代唯一公开的关于中共情报的英文全面信息，至今仍有用。郭先生于 1985 年 8 月去世时，蒋经国和李登辉为他撰写了乾谷花圈铭文。2008 年台北档案管理员访谈，以及 2008 年查看的关于郭沃伦的非机密收藏摘录。

  31.  Kuo’s writings were the only publicly available, comprehensive information in English about CCP intelligence from 1968–71 until the 1980s, and they remain useful today. When Kuo died in August 1985, qian’gu floral wreath inscriptions were written for him by Chiang Ching-kuo and Lee Teng-hui. Interview, Taipei archivist, 2008, and extract of unclassified collection on Warren Kuo viewed in 2008.

  [32] 中共书记处：〈关于设立中央社会部的决定〉，1939年2月18日，载于1948年12月《抗战中挖袒保护文件》。

  34. SAD 的公共名称之一是敌区工作委员会。李克农于 1941 年 3 月成为副主任，当时他也成为 SAD 的副主任。《中共组织史资料》，4,1945.8-1949.9 [中共组织史资料，第 4 卷，1945-1949 年 8 月]（北京：中工党书社，2000 年），第 549 页;郝，中国 mimi zhan，54,59。

  34.  One of the SAD’s public names was the Enemy Area Work Commission. Li Kenong became a deputy director in March 1941, when he also became a SAD deputy director. 107. 即使在 1969 年，中央情报局的一份机密报告也提到了 SAD，但没有提到 CID 的存在。参见中央情报局，“共产主义中国：政治安全机构”，POLO 35,1969 年 2 月 20 日（解密），ii-iv，10-16,22-25,29,31,33-35,65,70-71。

107.  Even in 1969, a classified CIA report referred to the SAD and did not note the existence of the CID. See Central Intelligence Agency, “Communist China: The Political Security Apparatus,” POLO 35, February 20, 1969 (declassified), ii-iv, 10–16, 22–25, 29, 31, 33–35, 65, 70–71.

142. 迈斯纳，483-84,486-87;理查德·鲍姆，“通往天安门之路”，载于麦克法夸尔，《中国政治》，第350-54页;奥维尔·谢尔和约翰·鲁利，《财富与权力：中国走向二十一世纪的长征》（纽约：兰登书屋，2013 年），第 281-82 页。

142.  Meisner, 483–84, 486–87; Richard Baum, “The Road to Tiananmen,” in MacFarquhar, The Politics of China, 350–54; Orville Schell and John Delury, Wealth and Power: China’s Long March to the Twenty-First Century (New York: Random House, 2013), 281–82.

143. 莫里斯·迈斯纳，《毛的中国及之后》，461-66。

143.  Maurice Meisner, Mao’s China and After, 461–66.

144. 马克·斯托克斯和伊恩·伊斯顿，“中国人民解放军总参谋部：不断发展的组织和任务”，载于《中国人民解放军组织2.0》，凯文·波尔佩特和肯尼斯·艾伦编（弗吉尼亚州维也纳：DGI Inc.，2015年），第146-47页。

145. 1987 年美国对驻华盛顿的解放军二武官侯德生的刺杀行动是中国武官从事秘密人类情报行动的唯一公开讨论的例子。詹姆斯·曼恩和罗纳德·奥斯特罗，“美国因间谍活动驱逐两名中国特使”，《洛杉矶时报》，1987 年 12 月 31 日。

145.  The U.S. sting operation in 1987 against a 2PLA military attaché in Washington, Hou Desheng, is the only publicly discussed example of a Chinese military attaché engaged in clandestine human intelligence operations. James Mann and Ronald Ostrow, “U.S. Ousts Two Chinese Envoys for Espionage,” Los Angeles Times, December 31, 1987.

146. 根据所依赖的来源，解放军还拥有第七局，被描述为属于第二解放军技术系统或第四分析局。尼古拉斯·埃夫蒂米亚德斯，《中国情报行动》（安纳波利斯，马里兰州：海军学院出版社，1994 年），第 78-84、86 页;Kan Zhongguo，“情报机构数量众多，间谍无处不在;“中国主要情报部门全面暴露”，Chien Shao（香港），2006 年 1 月 1 日;Howard DeVore，《中国情报和内部安全部队》（英国库尔斯登：Jane's Information Group，1999 年），第 4-2 节。

146.  Depending which sources are relied upon, the PLA also possessed a Seventh Bureau, variously described as belonging to the 2PLA technical system or as a fourth analytic bureau. Nicholas Eftimiades, Chinese Intelligence Operations (Annapolis, MD: Naval Institute Press, 1994), 78–84, 86; Kan Zhongguo, “Intelligence Agencies Exist in Great Numbers, Spies Are Present Everywhere; China’s Major Intelligence Departments Fully Exposed,” Chien Shao (Hong Kong), January 1, 2006; Howard DeVore, China’s Intelligence and Internal Security Forces (Coulsdon, UK: Jane’s Information Group, 1999), sec. 4–2.

147. 这些责任地理区域是最好的可用信息，即使它们看起来过时且不足以满足北京可能的情报需求。这是一个很难识别循环报告的领域，如果不是不可能的话。

147.  These geographic areas of responsibility are the best available information, even if they appear outdated and insufficient for Beijing’s likely intelligence needs. This is an area where circular reporting is difficult if not impossible to identify.

第 2 章.中共情报领导人

On the wider campaign see C. Martin Wilbur, “The Nationalist Revolution: From Canton to Nanking, 1923–28,” in Cambridge History of China, vol. 12, ed. John K. Fairbank (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1983), 555.

  59. 鄂豫皖根据地（鄂豫皖根据地）位于湖南、安徽和河南的边境地区，距上海以西约 500 英里。附近最近的城市是武汉。

  59.  The Eyuwan soviet base area (鄂豫皖根据地, Eyuwan genjudi) was in the border areas of Hunan, Anhui, and Henan, about five hundred miles west of Shanghai. The closest nearby city was Wuhan.

  67. 关于华父母的信息很少。邓小平的支持者于 1977 年撰写的一份地下通告声称，华的母亲有很多情人，包括保护他的康生。罗伯特·韦瑟利，《毛被遗忘的继任者：华国锋的政治生涯》（纽约：帕尔格雷夫·麦克米伦出版社，2010年），第23-26页。

  67.  Little information is available on Hua’s parents. An underground circular written in 1977 by supporters of Deng Xiaoping claimed that Hua’s mother had many lovers, including Kang Sheng, who protected him. Robert Weatherly, Mao’s Forgotten Successor: The Political Career of Hua Guofeng (New York: Palgrave Macmillan, 2010), 23–26.

  98. 尽管他的名字多次更改，但我们将始终使用 Kang Sheng。消息来源对康的出生年份和加入中共的日期存在分歧，但官方记录分别记录了 1898 年和 1925 年。沈中阳伟源， 701;王和刘，中国显代师人武专，733。

  98.  In spite of his many name changes, we will use Kang Sheng throughout. Sources disagree on Kang’s birth year and date for joining the CCP, but the official records document 1898 and 1925, respectively. Shen, Zhongyang weiyuan, 701; Wang and Liu, Zhongguo Xiandaishi Renwu Zhuan, 733.

  99. 约翰·拜伦和罗伯特·帕克，《龙的爪子：康生——毛背后的邪恶天才及其在中华人民共和国的恐怖遗产》（纽约：西蒙和舒斯特，1992年），第42-44页。

  99.  John Byron and Robert Pack, The Claws of the Dragon: Kang Sheng—The Evil Genius Behind Mao and His Legacy of Terror in the People’s Republic of China (New York: Simon and Schuster, 1992), 42–44.

100. 沈中阳伟源， 701;钟，康生平专，25 岁。尽管根据党的记录和内幕消息，康胜平传的辛酸和指责风格被发布，为康胜平专开除的正当理由，只有在得到其他来源的证实时才可靠。

100.  Shen, Zhongyang weiyuan, 701; Zhong, Kang Sheng Pingzhuan, 25. Though based on party records and insider accounts, the bitter and accusatory style of Kang Sheng Pingzhuan, released to justify Kang’s expulsion from the CCP, make it reliable only when confirmed by other sources.

122. 康生声称仅凭观察就能分辨出间谍（我看你就像 特务， Wo kan ni jiu xiang tewu）。郝，中国米米占，280-81。关于安保工作中“神秘主义”的具体定义，见李增群编：《实用公安小词典》（哈尔滨：黑龙江人民中央社，1987），第345页。

130. 毛泽东后来在他的《湖南农民运动调查报告》（1927 年 3 月 28 日）中将这一事态发展描述为“十四件大事”之一。参见托尼·赛奇（Tony Saich）编，《中国共产党的崛起》（Armonk， NY： M. E. Sharpe， 1996），第205-6页。

141. 虽然邓小平在文化大革命期间也失去了公职，但他相对没有受到伤害，因为他的背景“完全清楚”：他从未在敌方地区工作过，并且是毛泽东的人毛的游击队员（毛泽东德任）。2016 年与政党历史学家的访谈。

141.  Though Deng Xiaoping also lost office during the Cultural Revolution, he was relatively immune from harm because his background was “totally clear”: he had never worked in enemy areas and was a partisan of Mao, a 毛泽东的人 (Mao Zedong de ren). Interview with party historian, 2016.

253.  Jin, Chen Yun Zhuan, 105; Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 2–3.

260. 郝，中国 mimi zhan，8;金，陈云专，103;Kai-yu Hsu， Chou En-lai， 中国的灰色卓越 94;沈中阳伟源， 621.

260.  Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 8; Jin, Chen Yun Zhuan, 103; Kai-yu Hsu, Chou En-lai, China’s Gray Eminence 94; Shen, Zhongyang weiyuan, 621.

261. 1928 年 8 月 24 日，国民党根据白欣提供的信息突袭了上海新柴路的一个地址。他们逮捕了中共中央军委主任杨寅、中央军委委员严长义、江苏省中央军委干部邢世珍和中共委员张继春。见穆，《银碧战仙同师周恩来》，187。杨寅也是早期的中共党员（1922 年）和广东中共的重要人物。他于 1928 年成为中共中央委员。1933 年 10 月，中共以彭、杨的名字将中苏维埃共和国第一红军步兵学校更名为中苏维埃共和国。沈中阳伟源，68-269;郭，分析史，第 2 卷，第 92 页，第 312 页。

261.  On August 24, 1928, the KMT raided an address on Hsin Chai Road in Shanghai based on information supplied by Bai Xin. They arrested CCP CMC director Yang Yin, CMC member Yan Changyi, Jiangsu CMC cadre Xing Shizhen, and CCP member Zhang Jichun. See Mu, Yinbi zhanxian tongshi Zhou Enlai, 187. Yang Yin was also an early CCP member (1922) and a major figure in the Guangdong CCP. He became a member of the CCP Central Committee in 1928. In October 1933 the CCP renamed the Chinese Soviet Republic No. 1 Red Army Infantry School after Peng and Yang. Shen, Zhongyang weiyuan, 68–269; Kuo, Analytical History, vol. 2, 92, 312.

262. 穆，银壁展仙通帅 周恩来，194;郝，中国 mimi zhan，6-7。

262.  Mu, Yinbi zhanxian tongshuai Zhou Enlai, 194; Hao, Zhongguo mimi zhan, 6–7.

263. 木， 银碧 展仙 通帅 周恩来， 195;刘， 周恩来 大慈典， 8–29.

263.  Mu, Yinbi zhanxian tongshuai Zhou Enlai, 195; Liu, Zhou Enlai da cidian, 8–29.

264. 郭，《分析史》，第 2 卷，第 292 页。

264.  Kuo, Analytical History, vol. 2, 292.

270. 顾家被杀的人数在 4 到 24 人之间。高文茜，《周恩来：最后的完美革命》（纽约：公共事务，2007），第168页;Kai-yu Hsu， Chou En-lai： China's Gray Eminence， 94–97;迪克·威尔逊，《周恩来的故事，1898-1976》（伦敦：哈钦森公司，1984年），第110-12页。

270.  The number murdered in Gu’s family was between four and twenty-four. Gao Wenqian, Zhou Enlai: The Last Perfect Revolutionary (New York: Public Affairs, 2007), 168; Kai-yu Hsu, Chou En-lai: China’s Gray Eminence, 94–97; Dick Wilson, Chou, The Story of Zhou Enlai, 1898–1976 (London: Hutchinson and Co., 1984), 110–12.

271. 周于 1931 年 12 月离开上海。沈中阳伟源， 540;刘， 周恩来 大慈甸， 32.

271.  Zhou departed Shanghai in December 1931. Shen, Zhongyang weiyuan, 540; Liu, Zhou Enlai da cidian, 32.

272. Averill，“福田事件的起源”，81-83,107-9;张，《中国共产党名人录》，第 2 卷，第 104 卷，第 1 卷，第 171 页;潘佐夫和莱文，《毛：真实的故事》，第264页。

280.  Jin, Chen Yun Zhuan, 231; Kuo, Analytical History, vol. 3, 336–40.

281. 王明、陈云、康生被任命为书记处委员，中央九大委员是张闻天、毛泽东、王明、陈云、周恩来、张国涛、伯顾、向英。金，陈云传，231。关于周恩来在这一时期的困境的分析，参见Teiwes和Sun，“从列宁主义者到有魅力的政党”，363-65。

281.  Wang Ming, Chen Yun, and Kang Sheng were appointed to the Secretariat, and the top nine members of the Central Committee were Zhang Wentian, Mao Zedong, Wang Ming, Chen Yun, Zhou Enlai, Zhang Guotao, Bo Gu, and Xiang Ying. Jin, Chen Yun Zhuan, 231. For the analysis on Zhou Enlai’s predicament during this period, see Teiwes and Sun, “From a Leninist to a Charismatic Party,” 363–65.

284. 他的故事很吸引人。参见 Rittenberg 和 Bennett，The Man Who Stays Behind。

284.  His story is fascinating. See Rittenberg and Bennett, The Man Who Stayed Behind.

291. 1947 年，熊警告国民党计划进攻延安。约翰·吉廷斯，《熊向辉》（讣告），《卫报》，2005 年 9 月 25 日，https://www.theguardian.com/news/2005/sep/26/guardianobituaries.china。基辛格在给尼克松的信中说，中国是“强硬的理论家，在世界发展方向上完全不同意我们。与此同时，他们是硬派现实主义者，他们认为他们需要我们，因为有威胁的苏联、复兴的日本和可能独立的台湾。〈基辛格1971年10月第二次访华〉，摘自《新中国外交》，第3卷，第9-70页，https://nsarchive2.gwu.edu//NSAEBB/NSAEBB70/doc21.pdf。

291.  In 1947, Xiong warned of a planned Nationalist attack on Yan’an. John Gittings, “Xiong Xianghui” (obituary), The Guardian, September 25, 2005, https://www.theguardian.com/news/2005/sep/26/guardianobituaries.china. Kissinger held few illusions, writing to Nixon that the Chinese were “tough ideologues who totally disagree with us on where the world is going. At the same time, they are hard realists who calculate they need us because of a threatening Soviet Union, a resurgent Japan, and a potentially independent Taiwan.” “Kissinger’s Second Visit to China, October 1971,” from Xin Zhong-guo waijiao fengyun [The Diplomacy of New China], vol. 3, 9–70, https://nsarchive2.gwu.edu//NSAEBB/NSAEBB70/doc21.pdf.

292. 麦克法夸尔和舍恩哈尔斯，《毛的最后一次革命》，415;讣告，“罗庆昌”。

292.  MacFarquhar and Schoenhals, Mao’s Last Revolution, 415; obituary, “Luo Qingchang.”

第 3 章.中国革命和早期中国的著名间谍

  26.  Per these references, the former Fan Zhengbo residence is at the modern-day 淮海中路五二六弄, 43号 [No. 43, Lane 526, Huaihai Zhong Road].

  83. 安全培训包括基本要点，例如：除办公室业务外，请勿拍照;不要给家人或朋友写信;并且不要与任何人讨论这项工作。尹，潘汉年德青宝圣雅，90,92-94。

  83.  The security training included basic points such as: don’t be photographed except for office business; don’t write letters to family or friends; and don’t discuss this work with anyone. Yin, Pan Hannian de qingbao shengya, 90, 92–94.

  86. 李世群要求请家里的朋友胡秀峰来做这项工作。她已经被部署到其他地方，但潘发现她的姐姐胡秀梅有空。

  86.  Li Shiqun requested that a family friend, Hu Xiufeng, be used for this work. She was already deployed elsewhere, but Pan discovered that her sister, Hu Xiumei was available.

111. 乔纳森·斯宾塞，《寻找现代中国》（纽约：W. W. Norton and Co.，1999），第343-44页。美玲的妹妹爱玲嫁给了孔祥熙（孔祥熙，Kong Xiangxi），这位银行家后来担任部长职务并成为共和国的首相。他们的兄弟宋子文（Song Ziwen， 宋子文）成为国民党中央政府的财政部长和外交部长。丹尼尔·贝斯（Daniel H. Bays），《中国基督教新史》（A New History of Christianity in China）（马萨诸塞州莫尔登：Wiley-Blackwell，2012），第124-25页。

Kung (孔祥 熙, Kong Xiangxi), the banker who later held ministerial posts and became the republic’s premier. Their brother, Paul T. V. Soong, (Song Ziwen, 宋子 文) became the KMT Central Government’s finance minister and minister of foreign affairs. Daniel H. Bays, A New History of Christianity in China (Malden, MA: Wiley-Blackwell, 2012), 124–25.

141.  “Zao zhu chujing Xianggang di yi jiandie Zeng Zhaoke qushi”; Gleason, Hong Kong, 109. The courier was rumored to have been carrying instructions from a controller in Macau. There may be more to this story since carrying a lot of cash would not seem unusual for someone arriving from Macau, a gambling haven.

第 4 章.经济间谍案件

    1. 克里斯托弗·安德鲁和瓦西里·米特罗欣，《剑与盾：米特罗欣档案和克格勃的秘密历史》（纽约：Basic Books，1999 年），第 219-20 页。

  86.  Some former U.S. officials believe Dr. Lee was involved with the Chinese intelligence services; however, no public information corroborated these assertions. Therefore, the Lee case appears in this chapter rather those involving the intelligence services.

第 5 章.大革命和早期人民共和国时期的间谍活动

第 6 章.中国崛起期间的间谍活动

Chapter 6. Espionage during China’s Rise

    1. 军民两用技术是指可以同时用于民用和军用目的的软件、硬件和其他物品。示例包括电子、航空航天设计、人工智能应用、精密机床、化学工程工艺、夜视设备和核技术。

    1.  Dual-use technology refers to software, hardware, and other items that may be employed for both civilian and military purposes. Examples include electronics, aerospace designs, artificial intelligence applications, sophisticated machine tools, chemical engineering processes, night vision equipment, and nuclear technology.

    2. Christoph Giesen 和 Ronen Steinke，“Wie chinesische Agenten den Bundestag ausspionieren”，《南德意志报》，2018 年 7 月 6 日，https://www.sueddeutsche.de/politik/einflussnahme-auf-politiker-wie-chinesische-agenten-den-bundestag-ausspionieren-1.4042673。

    2.  Christoph Giesen and Ronen Steinke, “Wie chinesische Agenten den Bundestag ausspionieren,” Süddeutsche Zeitung, July 6, 2018, https://www.sueddeutsche.de/politik/einflussnahme-auf-politiker-wie-chinesische-agenten-den-bundestag-ausspionieren-1.4042673.

    3. Hiroko Nakata，“中国猛烈抨击密码学家 Honey Trap 自杀”，《日本时报》，2006 年 4 月 1 日，https://www.japantimes.co.jp/news/2006/04/01/national/china-slammed-over-cryptographer-honey-trap-suicide/#.Wbi-dxmGPrc。

第 7 章.中国的情报和监控，过去和现在

Chapter 7. Intelligence and Surveillance in China, Then and Now

    1. Dutton，《中国政治警务》;Schoenhals，《为人民间谍》;Hannas、Mulvenon 和 Puglisi，中国工业间谍活动。我们也期待着 Faligot， Chinese Spies（即将出版，2019 年）。

    1.  Dutton, Policing Chinese Politics; Schoenhals, Spying for the People; Hannas, Mulvenon, and Puglisi, Chinese Industrial Espionage. We also look forward to Faligot, Chinese Spies (forthcoming, 2019).

    2. 薛宇，〈官语中宫中阳 teke nuogan wenti de tantauo，“ 1–4;郝，中国米米占，5-8;穆，周恩来，11.

  28.  “New Personal Details Form Arrives at Phuket Immigration,” The Phuket News (Thailand), May 21, 2016, https://www.thephuketnews.com/new-personal-details-form-arrives-at-phuket-immigration-57510.php#aEbA3ZgPtrQ7y38J.97.

  29.  Interview, 2017.

  29.  Interview, 2017.

  30.  Matthew Brazil, “Addressing Rising Business Risk in China,” China Brief 16, issue 8 (May 2016).

  30.  Matthew Brazil, “Addressing Rising Business Risk in China,” China Brief 16, issue 8 (May 2016).

◆ Selected Bibliography ◆

◆ Selected Bibliography ◆

In addition to the sources that follow, we relied upon a broad set of publicly available court documents, articles primarily from local and regional newspapers, governmental press releases, and general Chinese-language online reference tools, such as selected biographical entries on Baidu’s online encyclopedia when they appeared reliable. Also instrumental were research databases, including ProQuest, LexisNexis, and China National Knowledge Infrastructure. These databases, in some cases, offered English translations of Chinese articles that have long since disappeared from the Internet.

In addition to the sources that follow, we relied upon a broad set of publicly available court documents, articles primarily from local and regional newspapers, governmental press releases, and general Chinese-language online reference tools, such as selected biographical entries on Baidu’s online encyclopedia when they appeared reliable. Also instrumental were research databases, including ProQuest, LexisNexis, and China National Knowledge Infrastructure. These databases, in some cases, offered English translations of Chinese articles that have long since disappeared from the Internet.

Chinese-Language Sources

Books

Books

Ba Lu Jun Huiyi Shiliao [Eighth Route Army Memoirs and Historical Materials, vol. 3]. Beijing: Jiefangjun Chubanshe, 1991.

Biaozhun dianma ben [Standard Telegraphic Code Book]. Beijing: Ministry of Posts and Telegraph, 1983.

Dong Xiafei and Dong Yunfei. Shenmi de hongse mushi, Dong Jianwu [The Mysterious Red Pastor, Dong Jianwu]. Beijing: Beijing Chubanshe, 2001.

高华.洪泰阳 shi zenme shengqi de： Yan'an zhengfeng yundong de lai long qu mai [红日是怎样在延安升起的：整风运动的历史]。香港：中文大学出版社，2000 年。

文章

Articles

丁可.〈特工-民运-法轮功：一哥圣名德真师古石〉[秘密特工-民主运动-法轮功：一生的真实故事]。《明慧网》，2003 年 9 月 12 日，http://www.minghui.org/mh/articles/2003/9/12/57232.html。

Ding Ke. “Tegong-minyun-Falungong: yi ge shengming de zhenshi gushi” [Secret Agent–Democracy Movement–Falungong: The True Story of a Life]. Ming Hui Net, September 12, 2003, http://www.minghui.org/mh/articles/2003/9/12/57232.html.

“国安部藏人园10万任：国外4万多国内5万多”[国安部间谍人员10万，国外4万余，国内5万]。中国数字时代，2015 年 6 月 1 日，https://chinadigitaltimes.net/chinese/2015/06/ 内幕|国安部谍报人员10 万人：国外4万多国内5万多/.

“Guo’an bu die bao renyuan 10 wan ren: guowai 4 wan duo guonei 5 wan duo” [Ministry of State Security espionage personnel number 100,000 with more than 40,000 abroad and 50,000 at home]. China Digital Times, June 1, 2015, https://chinadigitaltimes.net/chinese/2015/06/ 内幕｜国安部谍报人员10 万人：国外4万多国内5万多/.

惠桂松.〈澳门中共地下党柯林〉任广西神机， no. 5 （1999）： 34.

Hui Guisong. “Aomen Zhonggong dixia dang ren Ke Lin” [Ke Lin of the Macau CCP Underground Party]. Guangxi Shenji, no. 5 (1999): 34.

罗艳明.〈陈云、康生与延安干部考试〉。《党市博览》，第 8 期，2010 年。

Luo Yanming. “Chen Yun, Kang Sheng yu Yan’an ganbu shencha” [Chen Yun, Kang Sheng, and the Yan’an Cadre Examination]. Dangshi bolan, no. 8, 2010.

孙国达.〜Wo Dang Qingbao shishang de yici da jienan〉 [我们党情报部门历史上的一场灾难]。北京日报，2009 年 8 月 31 日，http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_4447da480102x97r.html。

Sun Guoda. “Wo Dang qingbao shishang de yici da jienan” [A catastrophe in the history of our party’s intelligence services]. Beijing Ribao, August 31, 2009, http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_4447da480102x97r.html.

“Waijiao bu jie mi 'Keshenmi'er gongzhu hao' 周 Zongli zuoji bei zha an” [外交部揭露周恩来飞机“克什米尔公主号”被炸的秘密案件]。China.com。http://www.china.com.cn/chinese/TR-c/614445.htm。

Dzhirkvelov, Ilya. Secret Servant: My Life with the KGB and the Soviet Elite. London: Collins, 1987.

Dziak, John J. Chekisty: A History of the KGB. Lanham, MD: Lexington Books, 1988.

维尔纳，露丝。索尼娅的报告。伦敦：Chatto 和 Windus，1991 年。

Werner, Ruth. Sonya’s Report. London: Chatto and Windus, 1991.

韦斯利-史密斯，彼得。不平等条约 1898-1997：中国、英国和香港的新界。香港：牛津大学出版社，1980 年。

Wesley-Smith, Peter. Unequal Treaty 1898–1997: China, Great Britain, and Hong Kong’s New Territories. Hong Kong: Oxford University Press, 1980.

韦斯塔德，奥德·阿恩。决定性的遭遇：中国内战，1946-1950 年。加利福尼亚州斯坦福：斯坦福大学出版社，2003 年。

Westad, Odd Arne. Decisive Encounters: The Chinese Civil War, 1946–1950. Stanford, CA: Stanford University Press, 2003.

Whiting， Kenneth R. 今日苏联：简明手册。纽约：Praeger，1966 年。

Whiting, Kenneth R. The Soviet Union Today: A Concise Handbook. New York: Praeger, 1966.

怀曼特，罗伯特。斯大林的间谍：理查德·佐尔格和东京间谍团伙。纽约：圣马丁出版社，1996 年。

Whymant, Robert. Stalin’s Spy: Richard Sorge and the Tokyo Espionage Ring. New York: St. Martin’s Press, 1996.

怀斯，大卫。老虎陷阱：美国与中国的秘密间谍战争。纽约：Houghton Mifflin Harcourt，2011 年。

Wise, David. Tiger Trap: America’s Secret Spy War with China. New York: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, 2011.

Wortzel、Larry 和 Robin Higham。中国当代军事史词典.加利福尼亚州圣巴巴拉：ABC CLIO，1999 年。

Wortzel, Larry, and Robin Higham. Dictionary of Contemporary Chinese Military History. Santa Barbara, CA: ABC CLIO, 1999.

杨，本杰明。邓：政治传记。纽约州阿蒙克：ME Sharpe，1998 年。

Yang, Benjamin. Deng: A Political Biography. Armonk, NY: M. E. Sharpe, 1998.

Yeh Wen-hsin, ed. Wartime Shanghai. London: Routledge, 1996.

Yick， Joseph Y. S. 在中国进行城市革命：1945-1949 年中共-GMD 为北平和天津进行的斗争。纽约州阿蒙克：ME Sharpe，1995 年。

Yick, Joseph Y. S. Making Urban Revolution in China: The CCP-GMD Struggle for Beiping and Tianjin, 1945–1949. Armonk, NY: M. E. Sharpe, 1995.

于茂春.龙之战争：盟军行动和中国的命运，1937-1945 年。安纳波利斯：海军学院出版社，2006 年。

周恩来 （Chou En-lai）;和白欣叛逃;和中共中央委员会;和中央军事部特种作战处;和 CID;和机密材料盗窃案;和文化大革命;和顾顺章;和香港;和华国锋;和情报行动;和情报清洗;和纪朝定;和 Kang Sheng;和 Kashmir Princess Bombing Case;和基辛格;和孔元;和 Li Kenong;和罗庆昌;和罗瑞卿;和 MPS;和多机构过渡期;和聂荣珍;和 Pan Hannian;和潘静安;和 Peng Pai 营救尝试;和石佩普;和宋庆龄;和特别服务科;和龙穴三雄;和 2PLA;和王世健;和项云年

◆ 关于作者 ◆

◆ About the Authors ◆

彼得·马蒂斯（Peter Mattis）是美国国会中国行政委员会（CECC）的副幕僚长。他曾是詹姆斯敦基金会的研究员，并于 2011 年至 2013 年编辑了该基金会的双周刊《中国简报》。他还在中央情报局担任反间谍分析师。

Peter Mattis is the deputy staff director of the Congressional Executive Commission on China (CECC). He previously was a fellow at The Jamestown Foundation and edited its biweekly China Brief from 2011 to 2013. He also worked as a counterintelligence analyst at the Central Intelligence Agency.

Matthew Brazil 博士是詹姆斯敦基金会的非常驻研究员。他在亚洲工作了 20 多年，担任过陆军军官、美国外交官和企业安全调查员。他是旧金山湾区一家美国科技公司安全公司的客户经理。

Matthew Brazil, PhD, is a nonresident Fellow at The Jamestown Foundation. He worked in Asia for more than twenty years as an Army officer, American diplomat, and corporate security investigator. He is the account manager for a security firm at an American technology company in the San Francisco Bay area.

海军学院出版社是美国海军学院的图书出版部门，美国海军学院是一个私人的非营利性会员协会，面向海事服务专业人士和其他对海军和海事事务有共同兴趣的人。海军学院于 1873 年在马里兰州安纳波利斯的美国海军学院成立，其办公室至今仍在那里，其成员遍布世界各地。

The Naval Institute Press is the book-publishing arm of the U.S. Naval Institute, a private, nonprofit, membership society for sea service professionals and others who share an interest in naval and maritime affairs. Established in 1873 at the U.S. Naval Academy in Annapolis, Maryland, where its offices remain today, the Naval Institute has members worldwide.

海军学院的成员支持该协会的教育计划，并获得有影响力的月刊 Proceedings 或色彩缤纷的双月刊杂志 Naval History 以及精美航海版画以及船舶和飞机照片的折扣。他们还可以访问研究所口述历史计划的成绩单，并获得在全国各地提供的任何研究所赞助的研讨会的折扣入场费。

Members of the Naval Institute support the education programs of the society and receive the influential monthly magazine Proceedings or the colorful bimonthly magazine Naval History and discounts on fine nautical prints and on ship and aircraft photos. They also have access to the transcripts of the Institute’s Oral History Program and get discounted admission to any of the Institute-sponsored seminars offered around the country.

海军学院的图书出版计划始于 1898 年，最初提供海军实践的基本指南，现已扩大其范围，包括更普遍感兴趣的书籍。现在，海军学院出版社每年出版大约 70 种书籍，从划船和航海的指导书籍到战斗历史、传记、船舶和飞机指南以及小说。研究所成员在出版社的 800 多本印刷书籍中可享受大幅折扣。

The Naval Institute’s book-publishing program, begun in 1898 with basic guides to naval practices, has broadened its scope to include books of more general interest. Now the Naval Institute Press publishes about seventy titles each year, ranging from how-to books on boating and navigation to battle histories, biographies, ship and aircraft guides, and novels. Institute members receive significant discounts on the Press’ more than eight hundred books in print.

全日制学生有资格享受特殊的半价会员价格。还提供终身会员资格。

Full-time students are eligible for special half-price membership rates. Life memberships are also available.

有关海军学院出版社当前可用的书籍的免费目录，以及有关加入美国海军学院的更多信息，请写信至：

For a free catalog describing Naval Institute Press books currently available, and for further information about joining the U.S. Naval Institute, please write to:

会员服务

Member Services

美国海军学院

U.S. Naval Institute

291 Wood Road
